new.title: Lookism
new.author: Taejun Pak
new.description: Daniel is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Daniel aims to achieve everything he couldn't before. How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?

new.title: True Beauty
new.author: Yaongyi
new.description: After binge-watching beauty videos online, a shy comic book fan masters the art of makeup and sees her social standing skyrocket as she becomes her school’s prettiest pretty girl overnight. But will her elite status be short-lived? How long can she keep her real self a secret? And what about that cute boy who knows her secret?

new.title: The Remarried Empress
new.author: Alphatart / Sumpul
new.description: Navier Ellie Trovi was an empress perfect in every way -- intelligent, courageous, and socially adept. She was kind to her subjects and devoted to her husband. Navier was perfectly content to live the rest of her days as the wise empress of the Eastern Empire. That is, until her husband brought home a mistress and demanded a divorce. “I accept this divorce… And I request an approval of my remarriage.” In a shocking twist, Navier remarries another emperor and retains her title and childhood dream as empress. But just how did everything unfold?

best.title: The God of High School
best.author: Yongje Park
best.description: Mori Jin is a high school student and Taekwondo specialist who enters 'The God of High School,' a fighting tournament that promises the winner anything they want. What began as a competition to seek out the best high school fighter soon reveals itself to be part of a much greater plot that goes beyond Mori's wildest imagination. What will he give to become a true god?

popular.title: Noblesse
popular.author: Jeho Son / Kwangsu Lee
popular.description: Rai wakes up from an 820-year-long sleep and starts his new life as a student in a high school founded by his loyal servant, Frankenstein. But his peaceful days with other human students are soon interrupted by mysterious attackers known as the 'Unions.'

popular.title: Tower of God
popular.author: SIU
popular.description: What do you desire? Money and wealth? Honor and pride? Authority and power? Revenge? Or something that transcends them all? Whatever you desire—it's here.

popular.title: Yumi's Cells
popular.author: Donggeon Lee
popular.description: A story of Yumi and her brain cells.

popular.title: Sweet Home
popular.author: Carnby Kim / Youngchan Hwang
popular.description: After an unexpected family tragedy, a reclusive high school student is forced to leave his home -- only to face something much scarier: a reality where monsters are trying to wipe out humanity. Now he must fight alongside a handful of reluctant heroes to try and save the world before it’s too late. Now a Netflix Original Series.

recommend.title: Taste of Illness
recommend.author: Ilkwon Ha
recommend.description: Not having any friends is bad enough, but being swallowed by mysterious black sludge in the middle of class? The worst. Yijun is no stranger to solitude, until a school project plants the seed for a delicate bond with another loner, Suni. But friendship is a frustrating puzzle for those who are used to being alone, especially when one of them claims to control a black goo that only turns hostile when the host is gripped by anxiety. Will Yijun and Suni be able to open up and make something of their budding friendship?

webtoons.title: Death's Game
webtoons.author: Lee Wonsik / GGULCHAN
webtoons.description: He’s perennially unemployed, his ex-girlfriend has moved on, and he’s just lost all his life savings to a bitcoin scam. Burdened by societal pressures, Yijae Choi decides to take his own life. Insulted by his flippant attitude towards dying, Death comes to punish him with her game: he must experience death over and over again through 13 other lives. But if he can find a way to survive the imminent death coming for these lives, he gets to live out their lifetime. His life was a bust, but what about the lives of others?

webtoons.title: SAVE ME
webtoons.author: Big Hit Ent. / LICO
webtoons.description: Seven boys. Best friends. Their fates intertwined through the good times together, but also the tough times, as they have gone their separate ways and suffered greatly as a result. When all is almost lost for these boys, one is given a special chance to go back in time and help his friends fix the mistakes that led them down this path. He’ll do anything to save them, but can he? Or is he too late?

webtoons.title: Penguin Loves Mev
webtoons.author: Penguin
webtoons.description: Penguin is a Korean cartoonist who got married to an English man Mev. Sometimes they are faced with cultural differences, but they never fail to put a smile on each other's face. Follow their love story with this comic!

webtoons.title: Romance 101
webtoons.author: Namsoo
webtoons.description: Bareum’s planner might be full, but one thing she desperately needs in her diary is a date. When she is lured into joining a programming club by her friend’s hot coworker, it looks like there might be hope for her. But will her inexperience lead to her downfall? And why does she keep running into his bad-tempered friend instead?

webtoons.title: The Boxer
webtoons.author: JH
webtoons.description: You’ve got the raw talent. Or you’re the underdog. But do you have the heart? Do you have what it takes? Let’s see what you’re made of. The real fight starts now!

webtoons.title: Mosquito Wars
webtoons.author: JH
webtoons.description: One hundred years after mosquitoes have evolved into the strongest predators on Earth, only 5,000 humans remain. Mankind’s last hope -- an elite team of special soldiers -- races to save the day. Will they obtain the secret research that may give humanity a fighting chance against the mosquitoes before it's too late?

webtoons.title: It's Mine
webtoons.author: LuckS
webtoons.description: There’s nothing that Yohan Do doesn’t know about his crush, Dajeong. Where she sits in class, works after school... and even where she lives. But unable to approach her, he watches her every move from afar and will do anything to protect her. Anything.

webtoons.title: Mystical
webtoons.author: VAN.J
webtoons.description: Garam has always loved to draw, but his dreams of being an artist have been on hold ever since his mother passed away. Wanting to become more independent and focus on his art, he moves into his grandmother's empty house by the ocean. There, he meets his greatest muse: a mystical water creature with no memories of her past. Now it’s up to Garam to help her uncover what she has forgotten.

webtoons.title: Wind Breaker
webtoons.author: Yongseok Jo
webtoons.description: Jay's the perfect student. He's got straight As and he's the student body president. But after being coerced into joining the school's biking team, the Hummingbird Crew, he discovers a whole new world outside of studying. What new adventures will he face outside the comfort of his textbooks?

webtoons.title: Lookism
webtoons.author: Taejun Pak
webtoons.description: Daniel is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Daniel aims to achieve everything he couldn't before. How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?

webtoons.title: The Remarried Empress
webtoons.author: Alphatart / Sumpul
webtoons.description: Navier Ellie Trovi was an empress perfect in every way -- intelligent, courageous, and socially adept. She was kind to her subjects and devoted to her husband. Navier was perfectly content to live the rest of her days as the wise empress of the Eastern Empire. That is, until her husband brought home a mistress and demanded a divorce. “I accept this divorce… And I request an approval of my remarriage.” In a shocking twist, Navier remarries another emperor and retains her title and childhood dream as empress. But just how did everything unfold?

webtoons.title: Tower of God
webtoons.author: SIU
webtoons.description: What do you desire? Money and wealth? Honor and pride? Authority and power? Revenge? Or something that transcends them all? Whatever you desire—it's here.

webtoons.title: Days of Hana
webtoons.author: Seokwoo
webtoons.description: Friends since childhood, Haru and Hana do not have a typical relationship -- Hana is human, and Haru is her werewolf who must protect her. Although werewolves are starting to have more rights, they are still seen as exotic beasts by society. As the two fall in love, what will be their fate?

webtoons.title: Yumi's Cells
webtoons.author: Donggeon Lee
webtoons.description: A story of Yumi and her brain cells.

webtoons.title: The God of High School
webtoons.author: Yongje Park
webtoons.description: Mori Jin is a high school student and Taekwondo specialist who enters 'The God of High School,' a fighting tournament that promises the winner anything they want. What began as a competition to seek out the best high school fighter soon reveals itself to be part of a much greater plot that goes beyond Mori's wildest imagination. What will he give to become a true god?

webtoons.title: True Beauty
webtoons.author: Yaongyi
webtoons.description: After binge-watching beauty videos online, a shy comic book fan masters the art of makeup and sees her social standing skyrocket as she becomes her school’s prettiest pretty girl overnight. But will her elite status be short-lived? How long can she keep her real self a secret? And what about that cute boy who knows her secret?

webtoons.title: Duty After School
webtoons.author: Ilkwon Ha
webtoons.description: What would you do if your school's extracurricular activity was a mandatory military service amidst an actual war? A class of students is turned into a platoon of soldiers to fight against unknown slime-like objects.

webtoons.title: The Sound of Your Heart
webtoons.author: Cho Seok
webtoons.description: While it may seem like a mere depiction of everyday life, The Sound of Your Heart is a comedy filled to the brim with wit, sarcasm, and parody. It gives no regard for the probable or realistic- it is a series of absurd situations that is sure to get a laugh out of every reader willing to suspend their sense of reality.

webtoons.title: A Bittersweet Life
webtoons.author: Donggeon Lee
webtoons.description: A collection of sweet stories about couples and singles, office workers and unemployed people. But be warned: there’s more than a touch of bitterness here.

webtoons.title: Noblesse
webtoons.author: Jeho Son / Kwangsu Lee
webtoons.description: Rai wakes up from an 820-year-long sleep and starts his new life as a student in a high school founded by his loyal servant, Frankenstein. But his peaceful days with other human students are soon interrupted by mysterious attackers known as the 'Unions.'

webtoons.title: KILLMAX
webtoons.author: Kennycomics(Paul Jun) / SilentMaru
webtoons.description: Born into a bloodline of witches, Max is forced into a life on the run from the witch hunters. But when she unknowingly finds a way to use her magic, her life changes into something she could have ever imagined.

webtoons.title: Nobody Here
webtoons.author: CheriArtt
webtoons.description: When Grace talks about what she wants to study in college, she was strongly scolded by her mother, something that had never happened to her in the last 10 years. Grace with fear, she decides to fix this very important relationship, but the next day she does not find her mother, or anyone in her city, and in the world? With the motivation to do the 'right' thing, she decides to seek out more people. She ends up finding out to her classmate that has another definition of 'correct.'

webtoons.title: Hellper
webtoons.author: SAKK
webtoons.description: When the leader of a biker gang dies and finds himself with a ticket to Hell, he sets out on a quest to change his fate. He needs to collect 100 black bracelets of other condemned souls to qualify for reincarnation.

webtoons.title: Sweet Home
webtoons.author: Carnby Kim / Youngchan Hwang
webtoons.description: After an unexpected family tragedy, a reclusive high school student is forced to leave his home -- only to face something much scarier: a reality where monsters are trying to wipe out humanity. Now he must fight alongside a handful of reluctant heroes to try and save the world before it’s too late. Now a Netflix Original Series.

Yijun is no stranger to solitude, until a school project plants the seed for a delicate bond with another loner, Suni. But friendship is a frustrating puzzle for those who are used to being alone, especially when one of them claims to control a black goo that only turns hostile when the host is gripped by anxiety. Will Yijun and Suni be able to open up and make something of their budding friendship?
